pr_title: Fixed bug with the profile text not being translation correctly

timeline.message: Fixed bug with the profile text not being translation correctly
Reverted translation on the core files as this will be done via Transifex
Reverted translation on the admin files as this will be done via Transifex

timeline.bodyText:
This is creating the following link, the href element doesn't have the username, probably was like that previously also, so the users page is displayed, but not with the current user information:
<a data-gn-active-tb-item="../../{{node}}/{{lang}}/admin.console#/organization/users?userOrGroup=reviewer" title="User details" class="dropdown-toggle gn-menuitem-xs" role="button" aria-expanded="false" href="../../srv/eng/admin.console#/organization/users?userOrGroup=">
timeline.author: josegar74
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -186,7 +186,7 @@
  • profile
  • - {{user.profile | lowercase | translate}} + {{user.profile | translate}}
